text: wql -ayha alrswl- lilkafirin aladhin la yqrrun bwhdanyt allh: aemaluu ma 'antum eamilun ealaa haltkm wtryqtkm fi muqawamatan aldaewat w'iydha' alrasul walmstjybyn lh, f'inna eamilun ealaa mkantna wtryqtna min althbat ealaa dynna watanfidh 'amr allh. wantaziruu eaqibat amrna, f'inna muntazirun eaqibat amrkm. wafi hdha tahdid wweyd lhm
